speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the joint debate on the report ( A6-0202/2007 ) by Mr Itälä on behalf of the Committee on Budgets on Parliament's estimates of revenue and expenditure for the financial year 2008.
original: President. The next item is the joint debate on the report ( A6-0202/2007 ) by Mr Itälä on behalf of the Committee on Budgets on Parliament's estimates of revenue and expenditure for the financial year 2008.
agenda_item: Draft estimates of the European Parliament for 2008 (debate)
